input.sentences: i went for a hike in the woods .
i saw a snake but i do n't think it showed in this picture .
it actually looks beautiful in this picture .
i thought the electricity posts were a stark contrast against the nature around me .
output.sentences: I began the day with a hike in the woods.
I paused to take a picture of a snake by the trail.
The trail led to some beautiful sparkling water.
It was so beautiful I just had to take a picture.
The nearby posts were a stark contrast to the nature all around it, but in a way that tied it all to civilisation nearby.
